rooms.description: Spacious open living area with contemporary design, featuring a north-facing entrance leading into the space.
Modern dining space integrated within the ground floor open plan area.
Contemporary kitchen with built-in cabinetry, optimized for workflow and adherence to local building norms.
Studio bedroom featuring a spacious balcony overlooking the north-facing entrance, designed with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Additional studio bedroom with its own balcony, ensuring privacy and adherence to contemporary design standards.
Small study area incorporated into the living space for work or relaxation.

openings.description: North-facing entrance with modern design elements that harmonize with local building norms and Vastu principles.
Spacious balconies attached to each bedroom, providing ample outdoor space and natural ventilation.
Direct access from the ground floor to a contemporary swimming pool, designed for leisure and relaxation.
